u.span: Distance Learning Will Continue the Rest of the Year

br.span:
<---- Look on the left sidebar, near the top... click the *Distance Learning* tab to find links to your class's materials (organized by teacher).
Please contact us if you cannot access materials.
Students must make contact with their advisor every school day for attendance purposes.

font.style: color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2; text-align: start; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; white-space: normal; widows: 2; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255); text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial;

font.font: Hello parents and guardians of ERATS students,

span.span: Here's what you need to know about our school's distance learning plan starting Monday, March 30th.

font.font: Most importantly for everyone:

span.span: * Even though we can't be in the building together, all students will still be able to earn school credits during this time

font.font: * Calling, texting, and online communications will keep students in daily contact with teachers and staff to help them with schoolwork
* Students will be able to work on schoolwork anytime during their day, not just 8:30 am - 2:30 pm

span.span: * All teachers and paraprofessionals will be available for help, Monday - Friday 10:00 am to 2:00 pm

font.font: * All students were contacted by their advising teacher on Monday, March 30th by noon with schoolwork information
Specific to our 12th grade students and families:

span.span: * Seniors will still be able to complete work and graduate this spring!

font.font: * We are still hoping to hold graduation as scheduled on Thursday, May 21st, 2020
* If we can't have a large ceremony, we will have smaller ceremonies as allowed by Minnesota Dept of Health guidelines at that time
* No matter what, graduates will get caps, gowns, tassels, and diplomas and will be able to get pictures with family and close friends!
For all families:

span.span: * Some teachers have prepared packets, kits, or paper-pencil materials

font.font: * Some teachers have prepared online materials for students to work on
* Students will be receiving packet work and kits Mondays, Wednesdays, and Fridays as needed
* Our transportation staff has been delivering meals and will take on the responsibility of getting materials to students
* These schoolwork drop offs will generally be 9 am - noon on M, W, and F
* Online materials will generally be accessible through cell phones, though in some cases (ex: yearbook class) a computer will be necessary

span.span: * Students will be marked "in attendance" by making daily contact with their teachers, especially their advising teacher or para

font.font: * This contact can be texting, calling, emailing, other online class communications, or by submitting online work
* These contacts are logged daily into an attendance and progress system
* If a student is not in contact with their advising teacher for (2) consecutive school days, parents will be contacted
* If a student is not in contact with their advising teacher for (5) consecutive school days, outside agencies may be alerted to ensure student safety at that time
If your child does not have any access to the internet at this time:

span.span: * We are working with families on a case-by-case basis to get students online access as it is needed

font.font: * Please email or call me, Mrs Hendrickson (Hendi) at ahendrickson@mnerats.org or (218) 750-2980

span.span: More information will follow. If you are friends or family with any other ERATS parents or guardians, please pass
on this initial information. We are trying our best to contact all families directly, but any and all help is appreciated!

font.font: Thanks so much,
Amy Hendrickson - Teacher and School Director
(218) 744-7965 (main school phone, leave message at #0)

a.span: Click here for a message from our school nurse refreshing your knowledge about illness prevention.

span.style: font-family: Times New Roman, arial, Times, serif

br.span:
Parents and community members are welcome to join our School Board!
If you're interested in learning more, contact:
Executive Director Amy Hendrickson
ahendrickson@mnerats.org
or call 218 744-7965 ext. 1100
or Facebook message the school.
See our Board pages for the meeting schedule.
FOLLOW OUR FACEBOOK PAGE
for news and announcements!
